channel.title: Why are there so many idiots?
channel.description: Just a little discussion, sometimes I want to punch a wall reading some of the idiots that post on this forum. Do you guys think it's the RuneScape community that's attracting all of these 10 year olds?

item.title: Why are there so many idiots?
item.dc:creator: @Pluvia Pluvia
item.description:
@Pluvia wrote:

You know when I read the topics title I figured it would be by Krakkid or fredder.

Read full topic

item.title: Why are there so many idiots?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:28, topic:370785”][quote author=Backlash link=topic=466878.msg3414735#msg3414735 date=1290965657]

I would only assume that content made for kids would attract kids…

But it’s not technically made for kids, I mean isn’t or wasn’t there a 13 age requirement?
[/quote]

I joined at age 10. I’m now 15(almost 16). No kid, not even a 16 year old is going to read the ToS, and actually get off the website because of his/her age.[/quote]porn sites etc

Read full topic

[/quote]

But it’s not technically made for kids, I mean isn’t or wasn’t there a 13 age requirement?[/quote]

item.source: Why are there so many idiots?

item.title: Why are there so many idiots?
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:17, topic:370785”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=466878.msg3414008#msg3414008 date=1290913944]
I think you have the wrong attitude about it and are, in all due respect, acting exactly just like how you described.

Maybe you should look at everyone individually. Maybe you should not cohere to this stero-typing and take a step back.

Of course it’s RuneScape that’s at the bottom of attracting people to this forums, the forum wouldn’t be here otherwise.

Now on the other hand, I can see where you’re coming from; someone starts to antagonise you, you want to say one better as to not look weak infront of everyone. This only makes things worse as you get tic for tac, flaming back and fourth and it only gives you a bad name as you just became the very thing you didn’t want, and all for trying to retain your dignity. Retaliating does the opposite of what you expect or want it to achieve.

So what do you do? It’s kind of a catch-22. If someones being a prick, instead of trying to get back at them and risk losing your own reputation, report and move on - therefore you are retaining (not gaining but at the same time not losing) your so called “image” or “reputation” (not Rep++) online.

You can’t judge every ten year-old from one singular ten-year old.

I can’t put my finger on what I’m trying to get at here, I could explain it a hundred different ways, I just hope you catch my drift.
[/quote]
I was two lazy to read all of that, someone sum it up for me pweez? lmao[/quote]

Basically, the OP is just as bad as what he trying to describe.

Read full topic
item.source: Why are there so many idiots?

It’s a game, if people want to waste their life on it let them.

item.title: Why are there so many idiots?

item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

What would you rather have: the RSPS community going totally extinct or it thriving with the ‘incompetent 10 year olds’? As long as they make progress (even though it may be slow), I don’t mind as I myself was like them when I first came here.

Read full topic

item.title: Why are there so many idiots?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:

Maybe you should look at everyone individually. Maybe you should not cohere to this stero-typing and take a step back.

Of course it’s RuneScape that’s at the bottom of attracting people to this forums, the forum wouldn’t be here otherwise.

Now on the other hand, I can see where you’re coming from; someone starts to antagonise you, you want to say one better as to not look weak infront of everyone. This only makes things worse as you get tic for tac, flaming back and fourth and it only gives you a bad name as you just became the very thing you didn’t want, and all for trying to retain your dignity. Retaliating does the opposite of what you expect or want it to achieve.

So what do you do? It’s kind of a catch-22. If someones being a prick, instead of trying to get back at them and risk losing your own reputation, report and move on - therefore you are retaining (not gaining but at the same time not losing) your so called “image” or “reputation” (not Rep++) online.

You can’t judge every ten year-old from one singular ten-year old.

I can’t put my finger on what I’m trying to get at here, I could explain it a hundred different ways, I just hope you catch my drift.[/quote]

tl;dr

@topic: Most kids who bring up age or characteristics like weight are sensitive about those things for themself. 10 year old kids are just beaten irl so they try to act sweet on rs, give them a break.
